positive.review: Sometimes you gotta relaunch it, but no biggie for its convenience.
Works perfectly with my Vive focus vision. Super simple, easy to use, no BS.
it is good and having it in steam means auto updates
I like to do stupid faces
My face go pew pew and I smile to much owo

People are so incredibly rude to creators that provide free apps for the VRC community. It is free and made during someone's free time. This program works great most of the time and when it doesn't, just a simple restart fixes it. Remember to be kind and patient with each other even when things are frustrating.

For y'all who are complaining it's broken after december 1st:

First, delete your negative review.
Now, go to the tool in your library, click the cog or right click the game from the list, click properties.
Select betas, then select previous build. Update game, and there you go. You'll be back on the old version.

You're welcome.
Sometimes you gotta relaunch it, but no biggie for its convenience.
Works perfectly with my Vive focus vision. Super simple, easy to use, no BS.
Works great with psvr2 eye tracking and the whatdahopper eye tracking love it.
Free, pipes my data as I need, I hope this doens't get slopped-up and remains simple.

I'm really enjoying this new update. It has significantly improved my face tracking. While I know others are having mixed experiences, for me, it's much easier to squint, my eye movements are more responsive, and my tongue tracking has also gotten even better. My mouth tracking is still working great, too!
it is good and having it in steam means auto updates
VRCFaceTracking creates a bridge between facial-tracking hardware, and applications compliant with the Open Sound Control protocol
When it doesn't disconnect and you can actually figure out which ones you need for what, it's an amazing software!
For some reason, it doesn't seem to properly work for me. it only seems to track the eyes and nothing else. could someone help me?
noice, very useful for vtubing, or facetracking in general
I like to do stupid faces
My face go pew pew and I smile to much owo

IF YOUR PREVIOUSLY-WORKING FACE TRACKING IS BUGGED, ROLL BACK TO PREVIOUS VERSION!! The most recent update broke mine. 

Otherwise, this program has been great to me for a year and a half. No better option for Face Tracking. Just waiting on a fix for the new bugs from the calibration update.

People are so incredibly rude to creators that provide free apps for the VRC community. It is free and made during someone's free time. negative.review:
Horrible. Crashes constantly. Needs to be focused/in foreground to send data. Barely works with a 2e. Coinflip if it works each time I open it.
And the people who use this app are annoying.
Switched to Linux and now it doesn't work anymore.

as much as i love the app in terms of being able to have a global way to have face tracking working with addons provided by the community
i am somewhat dissappointed towards the support to this app
the app sort of wants to crash anytime i like to touch something that fits my needs espescially offloading all the face tracking stuff elsewhere
consider my review to change as soon as a new update is pushed out fixing some stuff
Removed a lot of features

i imagine it works a lot better for other people, but my experience trying to get this to work on quest link can only be described as the equivalent of getting your balls blended into a paste and being forced to eat it

The App window is too big so have to resize it every time i open it, there is no way to have it open minimized or open as a smaller window. and the app refuses to close with steam vr always have to close this first

The new Update (1st December'25) broke everyones FT in VrChat. So if you just bought a FT Headset, download the Version before 5.4.0.1.
Trust.

Horrible. Crashes constantly. Needs to be focused/in foreground to send data. Barely works with a 2e. Coinflip if it works each time I open it.
And the people who use this app are annoying.

Not Recommended. 

I was banned from the VRCFT discord with no reason given, right after a group of toxic individuals who dislike me were promoted to moderators. When I tried to raise concerns and even showed evidence of harassment and repeated targeted attacks, none of the VRCFT Admins or developers cared enough look into it. 

The project itself may have potential, but the community management is a mess. Favoritism, unchecked toxicity, and dismissive admins make it impossible to feel welcome or fairly treated. Until the team takes accountability for how their moderators act, I cannot in good faith recommend interacting with this community or developers.
Calibration update made my face and eyes jitter like crazy and do weird shit, if you have the same problem use betas to go back to the prev build, leaving this negative till they fix it

im very stupid brain and the fact i cant get it to work makes my brain hurt. find solutions on how to work ifacialmocap>VRFT>vrchat is very confusing, looked it up online and all i saw were words, and not enough showing. i need my picture book. if you have a small pea brain like me and want to use this, dont, not yet at least

Software hasnt been updated in over a year.

Extremely frustrating to setup.

lacking in clear documentation and troubleshooting (going to the discord to "ask for help" doesnt cut it).


Waiting for something else to be made, as this is now just too jank to deal with.

Update the github already!
been using this for a few days now with my vive Focus and now each time i start it up it crashes

The new update is not good. The face tracking is hardly noticeable anymore. I had it configured perfectly before, and now it looks like shit. 

My setup is a quest pro paired with virtual desktop.
Since there are no alternatives, I have to use this broken piece of crap.
Switched to Linux and now it doesn't work anymore.

as much as i love the app in terms of being able to have a global way to have face tracking working with addons provided by the community
i am somewhat dissappointed towards the support to this app
the app sort of wants to crash anytime i like to touch something that fits my needs espescially offloading all the face tracking stuff elsewhere
consider my review to change as soon as a new update is pushed out fixing some stuff
Removed a lot of features
shit

12/1 Update: Not feeling these changes. The old calibration feature in the previous build seemed to work much better and provide my face tracking a more expressive range. Also the new calibration just doesn’t seem to work well at all. Inconsistent expressions, twitchy eyebrows, and can’t even manage a closed teeth grin without showing my mouth completely open. Perhaps this has to do with how my avatar’s face tracking was configured, and I’ll investigate accordingly, but implementing a huge change like this that forces creators to update their tuned face tracking parameters isn’t ideal.

If you get this, I suggest reverting to a previous build.

i imagine it works a lot better for other people, but my experience trying to get this to work on quest link can only be described as the equivalent of getting your balls blended into a paste and being forced to eat it

The App window is too big so have to resize it every time i open it, there is no way to have it open minimized or open as a smaller window. and the app refuses to close with steam vr always have to close this first

The new Update (1st December'25) broke everyones FT in VrChat. So if you just bought a FT Headset, download the Version before 5.4.0.1.
Trust.
